title: ADA Apartment Available, Media Room, Outdoor Fire Features
posting_body: ['23680 East Easter Drive, Aurora, CO 80016', "Life is surrounded by tranquility and natural beauty at The Sanctuary at Tallyn's Reach.", 'Offering spacious studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom\xa0apartments and townhomes\xa0with attached and detached garage parking.', '\xa0Interiors feature breakfast bars, individual patio and balconies as well as built-in desks and shelving, perfect for working from home.', 'Amenities include a business center, outdoor lounge, pavilion, playground and community garden.', 'Community Features:', 'Easy Highway Access', 'Smoke-free Community', 'Attached Garage', 'Virtual Training Classes', 'Fitness Center', 'Valet Trash', 'BBQ Grills', 'On-site Garden', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'eagle bend apartments, apartments 80016, apartments near southlands, apartments in southeast aurora co', '*Floor plans and pricing are subject to error, change or deletion.', 'Some photos are for representation purposes only.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!']
